definition: an act of appearing or becoming visible unexpectedly
details:
noun
- an act of appearing or becoming visible unexpectedly
= example: an act of appearing or becoming visible unexpectedly
- something existing in perception only
= example: something existing in perception only
= synonyms: phantom, shadow, phantasm, phantasma, fantasm
- the appearance of a ghostlike figure
= example: the appearance of a ghostlike figure
- a ghostly appearing figure
= example: a ghostly appearing figure
= synonyms: phantom, phantasm, phantasma, fantasm, specter, spectre
